explains: n. 赤裸；明显；赤身裸体

sentences.en: He had pulled the blanket over his body to hide his nakedness.
sentences.cn: 他拽过了毯子盖在他的身体上以遮住他的裸体。

sentences.en: So why did this nakedness evolve?
sentences.cn: 这光光地身子是怎么进化出来的呢？

sentences.en: In that devastation, in the utter nakedness of spirit, let us become one in beauty.
sentences.cn: 在这毁灭里，在精神的全部赤露里，让我们在美中合一吧。
